title: Is it true that President Obama has declared that there will not be any \Christmas\" trees in the White House? Instead all decorated trees will be called \"Holiday\" trees. What is the holiday??? Again Christ is being attacked."
text:
No, it's being called a Christmas Tree. Christ isn't being
attacked. The president of the United States is. Read here on how this
fake email smear started: 

http://mediamattersaction.org/emailchecker/200910150007



While FoxNews and other conservative bloggers may spread this, it
simply isn't true.
